## Our Objectives
The purpose of this vignette is to learn how to use a Bayesian framework deployed 
through [{trps}]() and [{brms}]() to estimate trophic position of a 
species using a one-source model based on [Post 2002](). Trophic position is 
estimated using stable isotope data ($\delta$<sup>13</sup>C and 
$\delta$<sup>15</sup>N). 


## Load packages 
```{r setup, message=FALSE}
{
  library(brms)
  library(trps)
}
```
